column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Gilbert - This is Keith Huang. I'm a managing partner and general manager of JINYA Ramen Bar in Midtown. At your earliest convenience
column2: please tell me the date and time you dined at our restaurant
column3: the name of the male manager who said this to you (or what he looked like)
column5: and approximately where you were sitting inside our restaurant.
